    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Verižna reakcija (fisija)</string>
            <string language="en">Chain reaction (fission)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kettenreaktion (Spaltung)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction en chaîne (fission)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação chain (fission)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione a catena (fissione)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλυσιδωτή αντίδραση (διάσπαση)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción en cadena (fisión)</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Predstavitev jedrske verižne reakcije na primeru trka nevtrona z uranom U235 in uranon U239.</string>
            <string language="en">Visualization of nuclear chain reaction in case of neutron collision with uranium U239 and its radioactive isotope U235.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jederska reakcija</string>
            <string language="en">nuclear reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">verižna reakcija</string>
            <string language="en">chain reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uran</string>
            <string language="en">uranium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">u235</string>
            <string language="en">u235</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">animator3d</string>
            <string language="en">animator3d</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtbarmachung der Kernkettenreaktion falls vom 
Neutronzusammenstoß mit Uran U239 und seinem radioaktiven Isotop 
U235.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visualisation de réaction en chaîne nucléaire 
en cas de collision de neutron avec de l'uranium U239 et son isotope 
radioactif U235.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visualization da reação chain nuclear caso que 
da colisão do nêutron com urânio U239 e seu isotope radioativo 
U235.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visualizzazione di reazione nucleare a catena nel
caso dello scontro del neutrone con uranio U239 ed il relativo isotopo
radioattivo U235.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση της αντίδρασης πυρηνικών αλυσιδωτοων σε 
περίπτωση σύγκρουσης νετρονίων με το ουράνιο U239 και το 
ραδιενεργό ισότοπό του U235.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visualización de la reacción en cadena nuclear 
en caso de que de la colisión del neutrón con el uranio U239 y su 
isótopo radiactivo U235.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kernreaktion</string>
